description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". West German Cinemagazine. Items include: German sport aid; the links between West Berlin and the Federal Republic of Germany; the energy tree; a year of voluntary social service; the Kiel Canal; Women film directors in Germany; skeleton bobsleds.
